item.title: Jim Brickman - Here Me (Feat.Mic.. Bolton)
item.description:
KY: 61990

Take these tears
put em in a bottle
Don’t let these tears
I cry be in vain
Take these tears
keep them up in heaven
Water my life
with tears like rain
Hear me
hear my words unspoken
Restore my faith
in hopin’ hear me
I am feeling broken
I am broken open
Take this life
turn it into something
I’m afraid
it’s just wasting time
Turn this life
the sun has ripened
Grow it slowly
on the vine
Turn my tears into
wine hear me
Hear my words unspoken
restore my faith
In hopin’ hear me
I am feeling broken
I am broken open turn
my tears into wine
Turn these tears
into wine
All that’s left
of me are traces
Make me stronger
in my broken places
Hear me
hear my words unspoken
Restore my faith
in hopin’ hear me
I am feeling broken
I am broken open
Turn my tears
into wine
Turn my tears
into wine hear me
